item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Takuma Kotani (a.k.a. kottn), a disaster prevention and mitigation engineer at IRIDeS. GH👾/SC🔉/TW💭/SD🎓/FB👥/IG🌻 Education Tohoku University, Japan Ph.D (Civil and Environmental Engineering), Mar 2019. M.S. (Civil and Environmental Engineering), Mar 2016. Kisarazu National College of Technology, Japan B.S. (Civil and Environmental Engineering), Mar 2014. Work Comming soon. Publications Activities Internships More details comming soon. Favorite I❤️Debian (__) (oo) /------\/ / | || * /\---/\ ~~ ~~ .
